paint_overhaul.other

Class PaintCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • paint_overhaul.other.PaintCanvas

  • public class PaintCanvas
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a better version of JavaFX's canvas. This class allows for easy drawing and zooming.
    Since:
    3.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructor for PaintCanvas.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PaintCanvas

        public PaintCanvas(javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas)
        Constructor for PaintCanvas. This function creates a new PaintCanvas object. It sets the undo/redo stacks, the canvas, stroke/fill colors, graphics context, and the redrawn image. It also sets up the canvas and draws it.
        Parameters:
        canvas - Canvas you wish to edit

    • Method Detail

      • undoLast

        public void undoLast()
        Un-does the last action. This function controls the undo stack. It pushes the redo stack with the undo. Then pops the last image. Then it redraws the canvas.

      • redoLast

        public void redoLast()
        Re-does the last undo. This function controls the redo stack. It pushes the undo stack with redo. It then pops the last image, and redraws the canvas.

      • redrawCanvas

        public void redrawCanvas()
        Redraws the canvas based off redrawnImage.

      • loadImageFromFille

        public void loadImageFromFille(java.io.File imageFile)
        Function to open an image from file. This function takes a file and loads an image from it. Then, it sets the openedFile to the file loaded and loads the image
        Parameters:
        imageFile - Desired file to open
        See Also:
        loadImage(Image)

      • loadImage

        public void loadImage(javafx.scene.image.Image image)
        Function to draw image to canvas. This function sets the width and height of the canvas to that of the image. It then draws the image to the canvas.
        Parameters:
        image - Desired image to draw

      • saveCanvasToFile

        public void saveCanvasToFile(java.io.File file)
        Function to save canvas to file. This function sets the saved file parameter. It then takes a snapshot of the current canvas and writes it out to a file.
        Parameters:
        file - Desired save location

      • autoSaveCanvasToFile

        public void autoSaveCanvasToFile()
        Auto-saves the canvas using the original file extension to preserve loss.

      • savePNGImage

        public void savePNGImage(javafx.scene.image.WritableImage writableImage,
                         java.io.File file)
        Saving capability for PNG images.
        Parameters:
        writableImage - Image to be saved.
        file - File to be saved to.

      • saveOtherImageTypes

        public void saveOtherImageTypes(javafx.scene.image.WritableImage writableImage,
                                java.io.File file)
        Saving capability for other file types. This rips out the transparent layer that is typically in the canvas.
        Parameters:
        writableImage - Image to be saved.
        file - File to be saved to.

      • snapshotCurrentCanvas

        public javafx.scene.image.WritableImage snapshotCurrentCanvas()
        Function that snapshots the current canvas. This function creates a new writable image the size of the canvas. It sets the parameters to transparent and snapshots the image.
        Returns:
        Snapshot of the canvas

      • snapshotCurrentCanvas

        public javafx.scene.image.WritableImage snapshotCurrentCanvas(javafx.scene.SnapshotParameters params,
                                                              double width,
                                                              double height)
        Function that snapshots the current canvas with custom parameters, width, and height.This function creates a new writable image the size of the canvas.It sets the parameters to transparent and snapshots the image.
        Parameters:
        params - Desired snapshot parameters
        width - Desired width
        height - Desired height
        Returns:
        Snapshot of the canvas

      • zoomIn

        public void zoomIn()
        Function to zoom the canvas in. This function gets the parent node of the canvas, removes the current transform, increases the current zoom by 5%, and applies the zoom to the pane.
        See Also:
        applyZoom(Parent, double)

      • zoomOut

        public void zoomOut()
        Function to zoom the canvas out. This function gets the parent node of the canvas, removes the current transform, decreases the current zoom by 5%, and applies the zoom to the pane.
        See Also:
        applyZoom(Parent, double)

      • zoomToX

        public void zoomToX(double zoom)
        Function to zoom to X percent. This function gets the parent of the canvas, removes the current transform, and adds the desired zoom level to the pane.
        Parameters:
        zoom - Desired zoom level.

      • rotate

        public void rotate()
        Rotates the canvas 90 degrees. Adds it to the transformation pane.
